name: Holiday Inn Santiago Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As we had an early flight to catch, we booked one night in this hotel. It was the best idea we ever had. The hotel is literally in front of the airport entrance, you cannot ask for more :-)
reviews.title: The best hotel to catch an early flight

reviews.text: When we went there, they were renovating the rooms however, we heard no noises whatsoever when in our room. We also managed to get a newly refurbished room which was very nice: modern, with all comforts, a huge shower and two double beds. The staff is very friendly and professional. In addition to the free wi-fi, there are also a number of PCs available to the guests (with a fast connection which is a plus!). As I said, best choice for an early flight :-)
reviews.title: Just what you expect from an airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Holiday Inn is conveniently located directly opposite from the airport; the rooms are rather comfortable (Wifi included), the staff is friendly and efficient, and the prices are adequate. There is renovation work going on in the lobby area so best to choose a room on one of the upper floors. All in all a nice surprise - if only all airport hotels would be like this.
reviews.title: Convenience and new face lift

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel situated across the road from the airport. The reception staff were friendly and efficient. The room was spacious and comfortable. There were major renovations being conducted at the hotel during our stay which didn't really affect us. The hotel looks really modern and impressive. A welcome rest that was very convenient.
reviews.title: Can't beat the convenience

reviews.text: We flew in at 8am from NYC and were flying out to Patagonia at 5am. As we were trying to squeeze in some sight seeing in Santiago it made sense to stay at the airport.
reviews.title: very convenient

reviews.text: I arrived at the airport at 10.30pm on a flight from La Paz , and I had a 1pm flight the next day, so I walked straight across the road and into this great hotel , the room had two very comfortable double beds, each bed had four very comfy pillows , the room was clean and quiet and very comfortable , lovely bathroom and then in the morning I enjoyed an excellent buffet breakfast and a relaxing morning before walking back across the road to check in for my flight .
reviews.title: Brilliant !!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I booked a room at this property primarily to take advantage of its proximity to the airport - we had a 2:30 AM flight to Panama City and after a long day of traveling to get to Santiago, we wanted to minimize the brain-damage associated with this departure time. And hopefully to get a little rest in the evening prior to our flight.
reviews.title: Hot Holiday Inn - Santiago

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you want "close to the airport," it's hard to improve on this property - you are a very short walk away! And overall, the room offered what we needed for our very brief stay - with the notable exception of a functioning air conditioning unit. We persuaded one of the staff to check out the unit, but to no avail - plenty of air flow but no cooling, and more than a little frustration. By the time it became clear there was no immediate resolution, it was late in the evening, and we declined the offer of switching out our room and opted instead for the sure thing of climate control in the airport.
reviews.title: A good overnight stay

reviews.text: Given our short stay, we did not get a sampling of associated hotel facilities (restaurant, work out space, etc.), but our general sense was that this is a relatively new and appealing property - but word to the wise, check the A/C before you settle in for the night!
reviews.title: Exemplary Airport Hotel

reviews.text: Couldn't be more convenient for an overnight stay in Santiago, and early flight.
reviews.title: Service could be better

reviews.text: This hotel is a 100m walk from the terminal so no transfer is needed.
reviews.title: A great little airport hotel. Everything you need.

reviews.text: This hotel has two sections, one which is older than the other. The newer wing has excellent modern rooms with very good bathrooms.
reviews.title: Great transit hotel

reviews.text: The public areas of this hotel are also excellent. Plenty of computers in the lobby and the bar had a great look and vibe.
reviews.title: Good Hotel for a short stay

reviews.text: The only issue I had was that they didn't offer a half date rate like many airports. On my second stay here I only needed a room for around six hours and had to pay the full day rate. But still it was a great rest after a night flight from Lima and before my long flight to Australia.
reviews.title: Got much better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for one night from Patagonia going to Easter Island. Chimu adventures organised our 10 day trip of Chili from OZ great travel agents & all our hotels met the criteria including this transit hotel. Quick service check in which was good as we arrived late and were due to fly early. I've stayed at the Holiday Inn, Phuket and now know this chain of hotels is right up there with the best. Excellent service, rooms & food. Best buffet breakfast out of all the hotels we stayed at. Great Internet. I would def recommend this place
reviews.title: Just what you need from an airport hotel

reviews.text: Unbeatable location, literally across the airport terminal. Despite that no plane noise at all and generally very quiet- my room was also very close to the elevator and I heard nothing. Room is spacious. No mini bar and ridiculous prices for the smallest bottle of water. Room service, however, was excellent, one of the most succulent burgers I have ever eaten. Both check-in and check-out were friendly and very slow but maybe I was just unlucky.
reviews.title: Quiet airport hotel-not an oxymoron

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very convenient to airport..You can use the luggage carts to check-in and out. Recently upgraded lobby..free internet service..nice, spacious rooms, very good service from hotel staff! Fabulous breakfast buffet..one of the best in South America! Enjoyed the pool,jacuzzi, sauna,,especially after a long flight! Booking direct is VERY expensive..I found Skoosh..I'm glad I did!
reviews.title: first class hotel
Excellent location
reviews.text: Excellent location, 3-5 minutes walk from airport terminal. Great for late arrival, and early morning departure. Nice selection breakfast buffet, spacious room, and good water pressure for hot shower. Free in room wifi, and late dining room service. Stay here 2 separate nights, for early morning flights to Calama (Atacama), and Easter Island.
Front of airport terminal has bus shuttle to center of town.($ 2 each way). Friendly front desk staff, and good dinning room service.
reviews.title: A little overrated, but convenient and works.

reviews.text: I'll be honest. It looks a bit more like a Holiday Inn Express. Shows some age in the bathroom and hallways. Looks like there's an attempt to update it in process. But, it's convenient to the airport & so far quiet.
reviews.title: Holiday Inn airport hotel

description: When looking for a hotel at Santiago - Airport, Chile, stay at the Holiday Inn Santiago - Airport. The hotel has a modern and beautiful design with high quality standards. Located in front of Santiago Airport, we offer easy and direct access to several areas of the city, including: El Golf Restaurants & Business area, shopping mall, Santiago downtown, museums and other cultural areas of the city.The Holiday Inn Santiago - Airport offers 100% free Wi-Fi access, restaurant (international menu), bar, business center, parking and a very nice indoor swimming pool, sauna & Jacuzzi. All rooms offer free wired and wireless high-speed Internet access. Please note that our hotel is 100% nonsmoking. We look to welcome you!
